summary: A simple mod which adds a few werebear spawns to the mainland of Skyrim. Requires Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod which adds a few werebear spawns to the mainland of Skyrim. Since they\'re naturally supposed to be found in Skyrim, I thought it rather disappointing they could only be found on Solstheim... 

There are eighteen spawns in total - scattered rather widely throughout Skyrim, with a preference for mountainous regions, although there are a few lurking around Morthal\'s swamps and the general Falkreath area. I debated creating more, but they\'re not supposed to be commonly found, hence the rarity.

I also tossed a single werebear into the non-boss werewolf spawn list, so there\'s a slight chance one might show up in place of a werewolf as well. 

At very low levels, the spawns will only produce a regular bear. 

This mod doesn\'t allow you to be infected with werebear lycanthropy (sanies ursus?), unfortunately. I don\'t understand enough of Skyrim\'s scripting for that. I am hoping that somebody creates such a thing, though. It\'d be fun to have that variety. 

In any case, enjoy! Requires Dragonborn, of course.
author: Diana
